title: Calculate value of total reserves from table

content.description: The table below shows monetary assets for a banking sector at the end of a year.
content.question: Monetary Assets Value (in millions) Monetary Base <math alttext="$4,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>$</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math> Currency in Circulation <math alttext="$1,500" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>$</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>500</mn></math> M1 <math alttext="$6,500" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>$</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>500</mn></math> Based on the data provided, what is the value of total reserves held by depository institutions?

topic.text: 4.3: Definition, Measurement, and Functions of Money
